action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghoul makes two Bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature that isn't an Undead or elf, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.
